title: Keeping animals in the classroom
creator_credit: Jeff Spencer, Ivan Gaal and Curriculum Branch, Ministry of Education for Zoo Education Service
brief_description: Trevor Lunn introduces Karen Svalesen from the Zoo Education Service who examines the problems that can be encountered when keeping animals in the classroom. Suggests suitable animals and information sources to assist with animal care.
creator_credit_for_label: Jeff Spencer, Ivan Gaal and Curriculum Branch, Ministry of Education for Zoo Education Service
